title: Hextech Annie!!!
body:
Pretty stoked right now, I purchased 20 x chests for the launch of Hextech crafting. I Managed to get Hextech Annie, Blackfrost Anivia, Gentlemen Cho, Magnificent Twisted Fate, and Rek sai (All permanents). I also got Eternum Nocturne and Spirit Guard Udyr shards but disenchanted them as I already own them. I managed to get Hextech Annie by getting a shard and crafting her with essence, this was about 5 chests into my 20.

What have you guys managed to get so far?

*Edit
I couldn't help myself and got ten more chests. Managed to get Forecast Janna and Championship Kalista permanents (the skin I was aiming for) as well as Aurelion Sol and Bard permanents. I also recieved SSW Talon and Warlord Shen shards which I have now turned into permanents as well and the only remaining champion for me to acquire now is Illaoi!

**Edit 2
For easter I got some RP from my partner, out of the 20 more chests I purchased I managed to get Final Boss Veigar, Corporate Mundo permanents. I also rerolled multiple crappy skins into Marauder Alistar and Silverfang Akali and I also rerolled three champ shards for my last champ!
